|brand = Samsung |model = SWL-2300U |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = B11 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 1.1 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = corded adapter
|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = E2XSWL-2300U |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Texas Instruments;TNETW1100B; |chip2 = Maxim;MAX2820A; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = b |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/15/2003 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Korea

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== {{WiFiCert|W000931|03/14/2003}}
==Links of Interest== [http://www.wireless-driver.com/samsung-magiclan-swl-2300u-2350u-driver-utility/ Drivers on wireless-driver]
The Windows driver [http://mcsales.biz/wesley/Wiresless%20USB%20Drivers/WinXP/netswl3u.INF .inf file] notes a few additional devices.. *Boot Devices (ACX101/TNETW1100B devices switch ID after firmware load) **055d:a011 (USB\VID_055D&PID_A011), "SAMSUNG USB Boot Device" **055d:a230 (USB\VID_055D&PID_A230), OEM, "SAMSUNG USB Boot Device" *After FW Load **055d:a010 (USB\VID_055D&PID_A010), "SAMSUNG WLAN USB Adapter(SWL-2300)" **055d:a012 (USB\VID_055D&PID_A012), "SAMSUNG WLAN USB Adapter(SWL-2300)" **055d:a013 (USB\VID_055D&PID_A013), "SAMSUNG WLAN USB Adapter(SWL-2350)" **055d:b230 (USB\VID_055D&PID_B230), "Netopia 802.11b WLAN USB Adapter" **055d:b231 (USB\VID_055D&PID_B231), "LG Wireless LAN 11b USB Adapter"
[[Category:English Documentation]]
